meanings.definition: The act of covering a surface with plaster.
meanings.sent1: The plaistering of the walls was done carefully by the skilled workers.
meanings.sent2: The plaistering on the ceiling was smooth and well-done.
meanings.sent3: The plaistering on the walls looked like fluffy clouds.
meanings.sent4: Her words were like the plaistering that covered up the cracks in their relationship.
meanings.sent5: The plaistering on the old building was so thick, it seemed like a layer of snow.

meanings.definition: A material used to cover surfaces with plaster.
meanings.sent1: The builders brought bags of plaistering to start the renovation.
meanings.sent2: The store had a variety of plaistering options for different textures.
meanings.sent3: She accidentally spilled the plaistering all over the floor, creating a messy situation.
meanings.sent4: The plaistering in the bucket looked like a mound of white sand.
meanings.sent5: The smell of the fresh plaistering filled the room as they worked on the walls.
